activities:
The E-Ceptionist software processes the following personal information from EU citizens:
Name, address, date of birth, phone numbers, next of kin information, date of death, medical insurance information, hospital numbers, NHS number (from UK), Codice Fiscale (from Italy), medical data (appointments, procedures,referrals/orders/request for service, diagnoses, images, etc.).
eucountries: Denmark, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with Data Protection Authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
